# The `BitMaskClassIterator` Class Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

This class encapuslates the logic to iterate over bitmask returned by the various RegClass related APIs. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Description {#details}

This class encapuslates the logic to iterate over bitmask returned by the various RegClass related APIs.

E.g., this class can be used to iterate over the subclasses provided by <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/targetregisterclass/#acf5c67f9a17117f6971d4341ef5018bf">TargetRegisterClass::getSubClassMask</a> or <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/superregclassiterator/#a66f920552b93c493f12da5ad41af45f8">SuperRegClassIterator::getMask</a>.

Definition at line 1300 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/targetregisterinfo-h">TargetRegisterInfo.h</a>.
